resources.string: TAN device for activeTAN procedure in online banking
The camera is required to read QR codes.
Request biometric, pattern, PIN or password for usage
Use without biometric, pattern, PIN or password
Please enter this initial TAN in online banking.
Please enter this serial number in online banking.
Please enter this TAN in online banking:
Please enter these values in online banking:
Press “Continue” to scan the QR code in online banking.
Thereby, the activeTAN initialization is complete.
A technical error occurred during communication with your bank. Please check your internet connection. Do you want to repeat the process?
Internet connection is required during initialization.
Unfortunately, the activeTAN app needs to be updated.
A technical error has occurred. Please try again later.
The device must be protected by pattern, PIN, or password (lock screen).
Please check, that you use the latest activation letter and repeat the process.
Please check, that you use the latest activation e-mail and repeat the process.
A different serial number has been entered in online banking. Do you want to repeat the process?
You have scanned your activation letter.
You have used your activation e-mail.
You have scanned the QR code in online banking.
You have entered the serial number in online banking.
Archive the activation letter to repeat the initialization at a later date if needed.
The device shows order details. Please check the data and approve the order in the activeTAN app.
Confirm your input in online banking. The initialization is completed.
Confirm your input in online banking. The order is released.
If no lock screen is enabled, the activeTAN app loses its initialization automatically and can no longer be used. You have to re-enable the lock screen to use activeTAN app again.
More features: The QR code can be scanned quick and comfortably. After initial initialization, activeTAN may even be used without internet connection.
Protect all your devices by automatic installation of security updates. Thereby, potential vulnerabilities may be fixed by vendors quickly.
Protect your device with a lock screen (pattern, PIN, or password). Depending on the hardware, you may additionally use biometric identification (fingerprint, iris or face) to unlock.
Enter your order in online banking.
The activeTAN app generates a serial number. Enter the serial number in online banking.
The activeTAN app generates an initial TAN. Enter the initial TAN in online banking.
The activeTAN app generates a TAN. Enter the TAN in online banking.
Press “continue” in the app and in online banking to proceed to the next step.
Sign into online banking. Choose the menu item: Login details and activeTAN administration.
You did not receive an activation letter yet? You may also request a new activation letter in online banking.
Scan the QR code on your activation letter with this activeTAN app.
The online banking shows a QR code. Scan the QR code with this activeTAN app and your device.
If you use different TAN procedures, select activeTAN to approve the order.
The activeTAN app makes using your online banking more secure. Data transfer via QR code ensures an independent approval of order data on a second device.

This program is free software and licensed under the conditions of the GNU General Public License version 3. You may use this program without restrictions and share it under certain conditions. Find your complete rights in the terms and conditions below.

QR Code is a registered trademark of DENSO WAVE INCORPORATED.

This program is based on the following third-party projects:

  • ZXing: Library for image detection and processing of 1D/2D barcodes
    github.com/zxing/zxing
  • Barcode Scanner: Library for camera based scanning of barcodes
    github.com/dm77/barcodescanner
  • The following Jetpack libraries from the Android Open Source Project (AOSP) by Google: Appcompat, Biometric, ConstraintLayout, RecyclerView, Room, Test
    developer.android.com/jetpack
  • Material design icons by Google
    github.com/google/material-design-icons
This TAN generator will be deleted permanently. Please also lock the TAN generator in online banking.
To repeat the initialization, the activation letter is required.
This device has not been initialized yet. Please initialize this TAN generator in online banking, before you may adjust its settings.
This device has not been initialized yet. If you muss a previous initialization, this might have been caused by a disabled lock screen (see manual / security). Please perform a new initialization.

"This device has no current Android security updates installed. This may be a security risk!

Please use banking applications on an up-to-date device as possible, so that the manufacturer may fix security problems.

Individual device vendors provide only delayed operating system updates or cease to support devices after some time. Without regular and timely security updates it is advised to use the banking app on a separate device. Thus, transactions may be verified on an independent device."
Please scan QR code in online banking (not on activation letter).
Please scan QR code in online banking (not on activation e-mail).
The format is not supported by this app.
Please check the order details for correctness

This activeTAN app processes your personal data for the purpose of protecting your online banking account against unauthorized access exclusively.

The processing of data during your use of this app is based on a contract or in order to take steps prior to entering into a contract in accordance with Article 6 (1) (b) of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

Below, we inform you about the characteristics of data processing, which comes along with usage of this activeTAN app on your device.

Data processing by this app

Two groups of personal data are processed:

  • A serial number, which identifies the TAN generator and which is assigned to the user's personal online banking account during the process of initialization. The assignment occurs in the bank system only and not inside the app. The serial number is stored on the device.
  • Order details, which are shown during TAN generation, e. g., amount and recipient IBAN. The information is transferred via QR code. The details are display to approve the order, are used during TAN generation, and eventually are deleted from the device.

During the initialization process, the serial number is exchanged with the bank via internet connection. Thus, the bank may assign the user's personal device to the user's online banking account. Any communication uses a secure TLS connection. The online banking website's service provider automatically records information about the established connection inside system log files. The following data is collected this way: the app version, the operating system version, the public IP address of the device, and the date and time of access.

This data is not stored together with the user's other personal data.

After completion of the initialization process no internet connection is required by this app anymore. Order details for TAN computation and approval in online banking are recorded and displayed via QR code and the device's camera. Within the app, such data is neither stored permanently nor forwarded to third parties.

The responsible institution within the meaning of data protection regulations is: %1$s. Principle information regarding data protection and data processing can be found in the data privacy statement, which we have published on our website.

As a user of this app, you have always the right to request insight from the person responsible about the processing of any personal information concerning you: the recipients to whom the personal data relating to you have been disclosed or are still being disclosed and the purposes for which the personal data is processed. Further rights regarding GDPR remain unaffected by this.
Camera access not permitted. The camera is required to read QR codes.
To start initialization now, please scan the QR code from your activeTAN activation letter.
To start initialization now, please scan the QR code from your activeTAN activation e-mail.
This app hasn\'t been initialized yet
The modern TAN procedure for your online banking
Initialization has been canceled before. Please scan the activation letter again and start a new initialization in online banking.
Initialization has been canceled before. Please scan the activation e-mail again and start a new initialization in online banking.
Serial number will be lost and initialization has to be canceled in online banking as well.
Did you enter the initial TAN in online banking yet?
Please enter your device credentials to generate the TAN.
Please enter your device credentials to use activeTAN without biometric, pattern, PIN or password.
For your security, this TAN generator cannot be used anymore, because the lock screen has been disabled. Please lock the TAN generator in online banking and start a new initialization process.
This TAN generator has produced the maximum number of TANs and cannot be used anymore in the future. Please start a new initialization process.
This TAN generator has almost produced the maximum number of TANs. Then it will no longer be possible to use it. Please start a new initialization process soon.
The TAN generator cannot be stored securely. Please check your device security settings.
A technical error has occurred during TAN computation. Please try again later.
You have activated this app multiple times. Different TAN generators may be managed in the “settings” menu.

Unfortunately, your android device does not support TAN generation without additional authentication. You may activate this activeTAN app regularly. However, for each TAN generation it is mandatory to verify your device credentials (biometry, pattern, pin or password).
The TAN generator cannot be stored securely. Unfortunately, this device is incompatible. Please contact your bank and indicate this smartphone model.

The smartphone hasn\'t been unlocked after activation of the lock screen. For most devices it suffices to unlock it once. In case this has not been successful, the device needs to be restarted (press power button for a few seconds).
Unfortunately, this device doesn\'t support TAN generation without additional user authentication. The option cannot be disabled.
TAN generator has failed. Please try to restart the device (press power button for a few seconds). If this didn\'t help, please contact your bank.

Please send this technical error information to the app developer with no changes in content. Specifications of your device model help to identify unknown errors on devices by particular manufacturers. Although the app has been tested with many different models, there may be incompatibilities due to the large amount of available devices. It follows technical details for the app developer about the exact error cause.

"Local use of activeTAN is unfortunately not possible. Use a separate device.\n\nPlease initialize the activeTAN app for the same user credentials which have been used in the banking app, or delete TAN generators in the settings dialog of the activeTAN app, if they have been disabled in online banking."
If you use different TAN procedures, select activeTAN in the online banking settings of the banking app.
Enter your order in the banking app.
Sending the order automatically starts the activeTAN app.
The device shows order details. Please check the data and release the order in the activeTAN app.
The banking app automatically executes the order with a TAN. It is not required to enter the TAN manually.

When using our banking app on the same device, it is not required to scan a QR code or to enter a TAN. Thus, orders can be released even faster and easier. Both apps are securely separated by the operating system.
After starting the initialization, you will automatically receive an activation e-mail. Scan the QR code on your activation e-mail with this activeTAN app.
Did you receive the e-mail on your smartphone? Instead, use the link inside the activation e-mail.
